column5: I don't know much about it,I've always been in a zone that don't allow pike fishing until mid May. Anyone know if or when nippissing usually has ice out? If that zone don't allow it then disregard nipp.ill go further up to a zone if needed. Thx

I don't know much about it,I've always been in a zone that don't allow pike fishing until mid May. Anyone know if or when nippissing usually has ice out? If that zone don't allow it then disregard nipp.ill go further up to a zone if needed. Thx  Nipissing is closed to all species until May 20th this year, I believe.
